ABOUT_PAGE_WELCOME: Welcome to Egypt - where anything is possible.
ABOUT_PAGE_P: Egypt is today one of the most cosmopolitan cities in the world. Egypt is home to many nationalities and offers a truly memorable experience to all visitors. Whether it is by the Giza Pyramids, or at the top of the Burj alQahera, Egypt lives and breathes a sense of possibility and innovation. And with an unparalleled coastline, beautiful desert and magnificent cityscapes, memories are just waiting to be made here.
SELECT_YEAR: Select a year to discover the story of Egypt
